text: Anata gata wa, kare-ra ga arrā o sashioite inotte iru mono o soshitte wa naranai. Muchi no tame ni, midarini arrā o soshira senai tamedearu. Ware wa kono yō ni shite, sorezore no minzoku 〔unma〕 ni, jibun no okonau koto o rippada to omowa sete oita. Sorekara kare-ra wa omoni kaeru. Sonotoki kare wa, kare-ra ni sono okonatta koto o tsuge shirasa reru
